scheme_name: Soft Loan Scheme for Women Entrepreneurs
description: The Soft Loan Scheme for Women Entrepreneurs in Kerala provides soft loans as working capital to women entrepreneurs to support their businesses, promoting economic empowerment and business growth.

benefits.loan_amount: Up to Rs. 5 Lakhs as working capital
benefits.interest_rate: Subsidized interest rate, max 5% per annum
benefits.repayment: Flexible repayment period up to 5 years

residency_criteria: Must be a resident of Kerala
business_criteria: Must own or operate a registered business

eligible_activities: Meeting working capital needs of businesses
Purchase of raw materials or inventory

steps: Obtain the application form from the Kerala State Womenâ€™s Development Corporation
Submit a detailed business plan with the application
Attach required documents, including business registration and residency proof
Applications are reviewed by the corporation
application_process.note: Applicants must provide proof of business operations

special_notes: Loans are disbursed through designated banks
Priority is given to women with established businesses
